headline: Does Everest Group’s (EG) Reinsurance Shift and Capital Release Signal a New Strategic Era?
summary: Everest Group, Ltd. recently announced the sale of renewal rights for its Global Retail Commercial Insurance business to American International Group and entered into a US$1.2 billion adverse development reinsurance agreement with Longtail Re, while its board declared a US$2.00 per share dividend payable in December to shareholders of record as of November 26, 2025. This combination of divestiture and risk transfer marks a significant shift in Everest’s portfolio focus, emphasizing core...
